sys_script.name: Delete Event Registry

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_54c8d5b047210610cf10815a516d434e
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>true</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_snc_ebis_configuration</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Delete Event Registry</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	const configuration = new ConfigurationUtil(current);

	configuration.getActions().forEach(function(action) {
		new EventRegistryUtil().delete(
			configuration.getEventName(action),
			configuration.getTableName()
		);
	});

})(current, previous);
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>david.van.damme</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-04-11 08:25:05</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>54c8d5b047210610cf10815a516d434e</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Delete Event Registry</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Event Based Instance Synchronizer" source="x_snc_ebis">beaac464472d8210cf10815a516d43d9</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Event Based Instance Synchronizer">beaac464472d8210cf10815a516d43d9</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_54c8d5b047210610cf10815a516d434e</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>david.van.damme</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-04-12 09:03:29</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=54c8d5b047210610cf10815a516d434e"/></record_update>
